message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. My asking price is $9,000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the value you'll get out of it. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get out of it. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $7,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value you'll get out of the product. Let's make this happen!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $8,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $8,000. Can you consider this offer?
